content: keep cozy in this modern herringbone stitch crochet beanie this toque is a classic winter staple for those cold weather months please note that this is an ad-free detailed pdf version of a pattern that can be found for free on www lakesideloops com in the future **sizes ** *f i t s* baby 6-12 months - 16-17 circumference 7 length toddler 1-3 years - 18-19 circumference 7 5 length kids 3-10 years - 19-20 circumference 8 length adult medium - 20-21 circumference 8 5 length adult large - 20-22 circumference 9 length in an effort to make our pattern as convenient and easy to read as possible the pattern includes **written pattern** in english us terms **pictures** **video tutorial** **left hand pattern available upon request** *all patterns and photographs are the property of lakeside loops©* **all finished products from our patterns may be used for local sales and sold online ** thank you for looking kind wishes kimberley lakeside loops www lakesideloops com
